head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Man Is Shot On Subway

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Man Is Shot On Subway

body.head.byline: By Andy Newman (NYT) (Compiled by Anthony Ramirez)

abstract.p: Unidentified man stabs Henron Winfield to death in Williamsburg, Brooklyn; police say there was prior dispute between them (S)

block.p: A man was shot in the stomach on a subway train last night, the police said. The man, 25, was on the southbound A train between the Ralph Avenue and Rockaway Avenue stops at 7:47 p.m. when another man, in his 20's, shot him once, said Officer George Jensen, a police spokesman. The victim was in stable condition at Brookdale University Hospital and Medical Center. In a separate incident around the same time, a 21-year-old man was stabbed in the leg on the platform at the Lorimer Street Station on the L train, Officer Jensen said. The police said they had no suspects in either incident.
